toggle_state.name: Show State Label
toggle_state.description: Toggle to display the state label.

toggle_countdown.name: Show Countdown Label
toggle_countdown.description: Toggle to display the countdown label.

update_interval.name: Update Interval (ms)
update_interval.description: Frequency at which the graph and label updates occur.

data_stale_detect_time.name: Data Stale Detection Time (sec)
data_stale_detect_time.description: Time without receiving new data before activating data stale mode indicator.

signature_header.name: Packet Signature Header
signature_header.description: Header to identify valid data packets. Leave empty to disable.

state_value_index.name: State Value Index
state_value_index.description: Position of the state value within the data packet string.

split_char.name: Packet Split Character
split_char.description: Character used to separate values. Example: '123;321'.

opengl_enabled.name: OpenGL Rendering
opengl_enabled.description: Optimize Graph Rendering via GPU acceleration.

graphs_antialias.name: Graph Antialiasing
graphs_antialias.description: Enable smooth edges on lines at the cost of reduced performance.

graph_data_points.name: Data Point Amount
graph_data_points.description: Number of data points displayed in each graph. Large numbers may cause lag.

gps_graph_data_points.name: GPS Data Point Amount
gps_graph_data_points.description: The amount of datapoints that showed in the gps graphs, the less the clerarer.
